      A Collection of Digital Releases:



         Lone (2004) (Digital-1280) (Son of Ultron-Empire)



          " Ravenous zombies have beset the ruined town of Desolation, and resident
            sharpshooter Luke has grown desperate. Her only hope is to track down
            and enlist the help of a gunman legendary in the western wasteland, a
            man known only as Lone. But even if she can find him, can she trust him?
            After fighting off the radiation-twisted mutants for weeks on end, Luke
            is ready to take her chances.

            [...] Lone is a futuristic, post-apocalyptic, zombie-infested,
            mutant-laden, robot-packed, radioactive free-for-all.

            The West just got a little weirder... " 

           --  publisher's promotional description, from
              <a href=" http://digital.darkhorse.com/profile/2657" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://digital.darkhorse.com/profile/2657</a>
